15 contributorsthat donâ€™t sound like you lyricsverse 1
girl im glad you called first heard you talk

i know its been a while i dont mean to pry
but when i asked you if youre happy i didnt hear a smile

nah that aint the girl i knew you always sounded like

chorus
truck tires on a gravel road
laughing at the world blasting my radio
cannonballs splashing in the water
doing whatever whenever you wanted
what did he do
because you dont sound like you any more

guess he didnt like it so you just cut it
and that dont sound like you

baby come back to
